title: Permanent

Permanent Lyrics
Permanent is a song by Norwegian Producer and DJ Kygo, featuring the vocals of British singer J Hart.

The song was released as part of Kygo’s 2017 album “kids in love”, as the 7th track.
[Verse 1]
You just
You made it look easy
It's like you didn't feel it
Not like I do
I followed
I followed the pieces
I tried to receive it
To when it was new
[Chorus]
Wanna get out, wanna feel like somebody
But nothin' else ever feels like your body
'Cause we held the world, we were turnin' it
For a moment there, it was permanent
I drive the streets where you told me your secrets
We made mistakes, but we both didn't mean it
And we held the world, we were turnin' it
For a moment there, it was permanent
[Drop]
[Verse 2]
I'll bet
I'll bet you're in SoHo
Dancin' in slo-mo
With someone new, oh
I can't lie
I hope you never forget it
And that you still wear it
Like all your tattoos



[Chorus]
Wanna get out, wanna feel like somebody
But nothin' else ever feels like your body

For a moment there, it was permanent
I drive the streets where you told me your secrets
We made mistakes, but we both didn't mean it
And we held the world, we were turnin' it
For a moment there, it was permanent
